testimonials.title: What our Students Say
testimonials.subTitle: Discover how FlashCard has transformed learning experiences for thousands of Students Worldwide

cards.title: Tania Chen
cards.subTitle: Nursing student & Mother
cards.body: As a working mom studying for my nursing boards, finding time to study was nearly impossible. This app's voice feature lets me listen to flashcards while commuting, and the night mode is perfect for late-night review sessions. I passed on my first try!

cards.title: James Thompson
cards.subTitle: Graduate school applicant
cards.body: The offline mode saved my GRE prep! During my daily train commute with spotty internet, I could still review vocab cards. The smart shuffle algorithm ensured I saw my weak words more often. Scored 168 on verbal - 15 points higher than my practice tests!

cards.title: Bisola Gboye
cards.subTitle: Pre-Med Student, UCLA
cards.body: he community marketplace where users share flashcard decks is amazing! I found comprehensive MCAT biology sets created by students who aced the exam. It saved me hundreds of hours of card creation and my score improved dramatically.

cards.title: Esther John
cards.subTitle: International Business Professional
cards.body: Learning Mandarin seemed impossible until I discovered this platform. The built-in pronunciation guide and stroke order animations for characters made all the difference. I went from zero Chinese to conversational level in 8 months!
